metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3733 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The "restore teacher" feature in Moodle 3.0 through 3.0.3, 2.9 through 2.9.5, 2.8 through 2.8.11, 2.7 through 2.7.13, and earlier allows remote authenticated users to overwrite the course idnumber.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
